title: Miguel Sousa
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101055728/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101055728/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Miguel Sousa**

Received a [MA in Typeface Design](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101055728/http:/www.typedesign.rdg.ac.uk/) with Distinction, from The [University of Reading](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101055728/http:/typophile.com/wiki/University%20of%20Reading) in 2005.

Creator of [adhesiontext](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101055728/http:/typophile.com/wiki/adhesiontext).

[TDC](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101055728/http:/typophile.com/wiki/TDC) Winner for his typeface, [Calouste](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101055728/http:/www.tdc.org/news/2006Results/Calouste.html).

Works at [Adobe](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101055728/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Adobe) as part of their type design group.
author: Miguel Sousa
